<samp>'''items.png-atlas'''</samp> is a [[texture atlas]] used to store all [[item]] textures.

== Format ==
<samp>items.png-atlas</samp> is a fixed-width 1024×512-pixel file that is split into different 16×16-pixel squares for most blocks and items. Only the top left 1024×512 corner is actually filled with blocks and items in the base game default textures.

== Viewing ==
Like other atlases, <samp>items.png-atlas</samp> can be produced in the game's screenshot folder by pressing F3 and S in 1.19.4 Pre-release 3 and onwards.
